rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Tora! What's up? You look a little
bit spaced out, looking at the view like
that.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0002
rows.name: Oh! Bro!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0003
rows.name:
Tora was just thinking about when
they captured Dadapon.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0004
rows.name:
Right... Come to think of it, this was
the place where he had to create all
those artificial Blades.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0005
rows.name:
Dadapon always was bit of a scaredy-
pon. Shy. Couldn't do bad thing, even
when needed to do bad thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0006
rows.name: What happened to Dadapon was...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0007
rows.name: Tora...?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0008
rows.name:
How could they make him make so
many rubbish Blades... Tora cannot
imagine how bitter it was for Dadapon!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0009
rows.name:
Huh?
Hang on a moment, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0010
rows.name: What is it, Bro?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0011
rows.name:
I thought you were sad because
your dadapo- I mean, your dad,
he got captured?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0012
rows.name: No. Not that.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0013
rows.name:
Dadapon happy whenever working.
Dadapon love his work very much.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0014
rows.name: Really...?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0015
rows.name: Really!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0016
rows.name:
Just look at Kiku and Sakura. Dadapon's
desires are written all over them.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0017
rows.name: Ah, yeah, it really comes through.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0018
rows.name:
But... These new generic ones...
I cannot feel men desires!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0020
rows.name: Something wrong, bro?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0021
rows.name:
Ah, no, just... Desires sure run
high in your family.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0022
rows.name:
Why, of course!
Tora family put their lives on the line
for their desires!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0023
rows.name: Let's ask the little guy something...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0024
rows.name: What kind of person was Senzo?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0025
rows.name: What kind of person was Tatezo?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0101
rows.name: Senzo? My Grampypon?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0102
rows.name:
Hana interested too!
Tell us, Masterpon!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0103
rows.name:
Hmmm... Honestly, Tora not remember
much about about Grampypon.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0104
rows.name: Oh...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0105
rows.name:
Grampypon always locked away in lab,
all by self.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0106
rows.name:
Senzo make lots of experiments and
research?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0107
rows.name: No, usually look at naughty books

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0109
rows.name:
Grampypon real stickler for appearance
and mannerisms.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0110
rows.name:
Grampypon not pursuing the image
of mature woman, but
immature and cute maiden!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0111
rows.name: Eh? That is what he was obsessed with?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0112
rows.name:
This not sound very scientific
but more like very criminal, Masterpon.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0113
rows.name:
On contrary. Because of Grampypon's
book-looking, Poppi is Blade she is
today.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0114
rows.name:
Grampypon work very hard to get maid style
and poise just right.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0115
rows.name:
He had to perfect ether furnace to
make his dreams real.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0116
rows.name:
Other detail Grampypon liked is
self-destruct feature, and hidden
devices.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0117
rows.name:
Grampypon always hunched over plans,
snickering to self.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0118
rows.name:
To little Tora, looked very much
like crazy mad scientist.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0119
rows.name:
But, I guess when he invented the ether
furnace, his desires and passion paid off.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0120
rows.name:
There's a lot of talent in your family,
Tora. No doubt about it!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0121
rows.name:
Hana's a walking testament to his
genius.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0122
rows.name:
Hana experiencing very complex and
mixed emotions right now.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0201
rows.name: Dadapon...?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0202
rows.name:
Hana also want to hear about
Masterpon's Dadapon.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0203
rows.name:
Huh... Dadapon quite an introvert
Nopon. Not expert in communication.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0204
rows.name: Tatezo always busy with research?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0205
rows.name:
Yes! Every day full of research. From
morning to night.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0206
rows.name:
At graduation party, was very lonely.
Not many friends to talk to.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0207
rows.name:
But brave enough to ask my Mamapon
to dance. Very lucky for Tora. This how
Tora get born.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0208
rows.name:
Mamapon said Dadapon was was so hopeless,
couldn't say no to him.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0209
rows.name: That... That's really heartwarming.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0210
rows.name:
Masterpon... Where is your mamapon
now?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0211
rows.name:
In end, said Dadapon was too hopeless.
 So Mamapon went away.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0212
rows.name:
So... It's like they got together and
broke up for the same reason.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0213
rows.name:
Grampypon and Dadapon always
together, working on artificial Blades.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0214
rows.name:
Never spend any time with Mamapon.
Make her unhappy.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0215
rows.name:
This make sense to Hana. Hana have
same problem with Masterpon
sometimes.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0216
rows.name:
Sorry, but there no other way.
Very busy making dreams real, living
life to max.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0217
rows.name:
That what Dadapon always say. 
But always get very sad when Tora
ask him about it.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0218
rows.name:
When Mamapon left, Dadapon eat and
drink like wild beast for three days, to...
To try to fix sadness.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0219
rows.name:
...That not sound too healthy.
Hana must make sure Masterpon
never get that sad, ever...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0220
rows.name:
Seems that your dad made a lot of
sacrifices for his work.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0221
rows.name:
But it was those sacrifices that made
Hana a reality. I guess we have to be
grateful for that.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0222
rows.name:
This give Hana a funny feeling in
ether furnace. Thanks for sharing,
Masterpon.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0223
rows.name: Oh! Poppi! That nice of you to say.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0224
rows.name:
Funny not always mean good,
Masterpon.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0225
rows.name: Excuse Tora?!
